msg: Update the testing helper class to match changes to SCXML IO and execution.

author: rahul
msg: Update command-line utility class to match changes to SCXML IO and execution.

author: rahul
msg: In a stateless model, the state of execution focuses around a "registry" maintained by the SCXMLExecutor, which performs book-keeping functions concerning a particular execution instance of the state machine.
The NotificationRegistry and SCXMLExecutor have to deal with the absence of the Observable interface in the Commons SCXML object model, and therefore, what was earlier effectively:
since listeners may be attached to o.a.c.s.m.{SCXML,TransitionTarget,Transition} which are the interesting elements for tracking execution.
Some qualifiers and access modifiers have been appropriately constrained in this commit.

author: olegk
msg: Fixed bug in the default connection re-use strategy:
HTTP entities with unknown content length MUST always be delimited by connection close if HTTP/1.0 is being used or content is not chunked
In this case invalid 'connection: keep-alive' directive MUST be ignored
